::DarkMouse/KitKat::

DarkMouse::
She runs and is hit by the darts.  She keeps running.  She runs until 
it takes effect and she collapses.  She falls and drops her pet onto 
the ground. Out cold.


KitKat::
She stops and stands next to Darkmouse.  Panting heavily, "Good shot 
commander. We got her. You carry her, I'll get the smaller rodent."
With her internal repairs fixing her shoulder, she transformes into 
bot mode.  She picks up the rat. "I wonder why she was taking this 
small rat with her? Huh?" 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scorponok 
>
